content: In one of our prior converastions, we talked about creating a #t-compiler/help stream -- well, I finally did it. I've been meaning to go back over that conversation and in particular draw up a kind of "zulip guide" -- but I decided to stop blocking on that for creating a stream.
tbh I see #t-compiler/help and #t-compiler as being pretty similar, but maybe the name is better, and/or maybe we can find a more narrow use for #t-compiler eventually
